from the inventor of the wheat stitch™ comes the **braided wheat stitch™ crochet blanket** is perfect for cozying up with this season! crocheted using delightful puff stitches and in one piece, this stunning blanket is not only beautiful but also incredibly soft. available in multiple sizes, it’s perfect for snuggling on the couch or adding a touch of warmth to your bed. whether you’re a beginner or an experienced crocheter, this pattern is easy to follow and will inspire your creativity.

this blanket pattern comes with a video tutorial. originally published october 2024.


crochet hook:
[h (5.0mm) - or size to meet gauge][3]


notions:
[removable stitch markers][4]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][5]
[scissors][6]


yarn:
[lion brand color theory][7]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g


yarn substitutes:
[wecrochet swish][8] 
100% fine superwash merino wool 110yds/50g


[lion brand mandala ombre][9]
100% acrylic, 344yds/150g 


[herrschners supreme worsted yarn][10]
100% acrylic, 169yds/100g


[mary maxim starlette worsted][11]
100% ultra soft acrylic, 180yds/100g


[mary maxim maximum value yarn][12]
100% acrylic, 474yds/227g


[herrschners worsted 8 heathers yarn][13]
100% acrylic, 489yds/226g


yardage:
total yardage will depend on size, see chart on page 4 for yardage and number of skeins needed.


abbreviations
ch - chain
blo - back loop only
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side


gauge:
15 sts x 12 rows = 4x4” in stitch pattern


not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][14]


sizes:
this blanket has instructions in 16 sizes, from a small lovey blanket to a king-size bed throw.


skill level:
intermediate
